sentences.sentence: We habitually anthropomorphise, which is why many of us call our cars “she” and give them cute names.
sentences.translation: 我们常常会人格化，这就是为什么许多人称自己的车为“她”并给它们取些可爱的名字。

sentences.sentence: I do not anthropomorphise my servers anymore—in the early days, each was named after a famous literary detective, while now they are merely numbered.
sentences.translation: 我不会将我的服务器拟人化了——在最初的日子里，我将它们每一个都以一位著名的推理小说里的侦探的名字命名，然而现在它们只是根据编号区分。
